name: No White Paper!
description:
Play as a pencil on your heroic quest to eradicate all White Notebook Paper, while sparing the Yellow Paper.

Controls: Left Click to rotate                                                                                                                                                 Release Left Click to shoot

Press "M" to mute/unmute the audio.

Try to shoot the White Paper while avoiding the Yellow Paper. Hurting the Yellow Paper will hurt you, so be careful.

You can use your eraser as a shield against enemy papers. But doing so will cause your eraser to shrink.

This is my submission for the first Boundless Game Jam

Hope you enjoy!
